Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27982 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27982 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.2-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-27982
